    .kramane.</p>
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    . <!--
    .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁṅ ahutaṁ hañolo surat pavitaniṅ apihutaṁ, dene lobhane kaṅ a[26v2]hutaṁ, nora haR̥p anahura hutaṁ, maliṁ patra harane, hañoloṁ rontal hesi, ḍeṇḍa: pataṁ [SH] lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, tur saguṁṅiṁ hutaṁ mulihanikəl·, mari kaṁṅ apihutaṁ, kahilaṅane [26v3] dosane,,
    2425@@B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ ahutaṁ, ṅañoloṁ surat·, pavitan hutaṁ, dene [20-26]lobhane kaṅ ahutaṁ, nora haR̥p anahura hutaṁ, maliṁ patra harane, [20-27]hañoloṁ <del>patra</del>rontal hesi, ḍəṇḍa pataṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmī, tūr sa- [20-28]guṅiṅ utaṁ mulih anikəl mariṁ kaṅ apihutaṁ, kahilaṅane dośane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁṅ ahutaṅ añoloṁ surat pavitaniṅ apihutthaṁ, [37-18]dene lobane kaṅ ahutaṁ, nora haR̥p anahura hutaṁ, maliṁ pa- [37-19]tra harane, hañoloṁ rontal hesi, ḍəṇda pataṁ lakṣa denira: [37-20]saṅ amava bumi, tūr saguṅiṅ utaṁ mulih anikəl mariṁ kaṅ apihutaṁ, [37-21]<margin hand="roman">106</margin>kahilaṅane dośane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@L (lo1): riṁ voṁ [38r3]ṅ ahutaṁ hañoloṁ surat· pavitaniṁṅ ahutaṁ, dene lobhane kaṅ ahutaṁ, nora haR̥p anahura hutaṁ, maliṁ patra harane, haño- [38r4]loṁ rontal heṣi, ḍəṇḍa pataṁ lakṣa: denira: saṅ ha:ṅrakṣa bhūmī, tūr saguṅiṁ hutaṁ muliḥ hanikəl· mariṁ kaṅ a:pihutaṁ, kahilaṅha- ⌈ margin-left-1: 38] [margin-left-2: , riṁ voṁ vuvus ha-] [margin-left-3: navur hutaṁ,] [38v1]ne dośane || 0 ||
    .@@M (ma1): riṁ voṅ ahutaṁ hañoloṁ surat·, pavitan iṅ apiyutaṁ §[30r3] , dene lobhane kaṅ ahutaṁ, nora haR̥p anahura hutaṁ, maliṁ patra harane, ha[SH]ñoloṁ rontal· hesi, ḍeṇḍa pataṁ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, tūr ṣa[29r4]guṅ aṅ utaṁ mulihanikəl mariṁ kaṅ apiyutaṁ, kahilaṅane doṣane,,
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ hahutaṁ hañoloṁ surat pavitaniṁ hapiyutaṁ, deniṁ ⌈ [12r-09]lobhane kaṅ a:hutaṁ, nora R̥p anahurana hutaṅe, hama- [12r-10]liṁ patra harane, hañoloṁ rontal·, ḍaṇḍanәn pataṁ lakṣa [12r-11], denira saṅ a:mava bumi, tūr sa:guṁṅiṁ hutaṁ mulih anikəl·, [12r-12]mariṁ kaṅ a:pihutaṁ, kahilaṅa:ne doṣane ,, 0 ,,
    2430@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ añoloṅ surat pavitan iṅ apihutaṅ, dene lobhane kaṅ ahutaṅ, nora harəp anahura hutaṅ, maliṅ patra arane, añoloṅ rontal esi, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi tur saguṅiṅ hutaṅ mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ apihutaṅ, kahilaṅane doṣane.
    .@@H (edH): riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ añoloṅ surat pavitan iṅ apihutaṅ, dene lobane kaṅ ahutaṅ, nora arəp anahura hutaṅ, maliṅ patra arane, añoloṅ rontal esi, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhumi, tur saguṅiṅ hutaṅ mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ apihutaṅ, kahilaṅane doṣane.
    . -->
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    .<p n="105">
    2435riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh">añoloṅ</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#le1">hañolo</rdg>
    .</app>
    2440surat
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le3 #edj #edh">pavitaniṅ apihutaṅ</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#ma1 #ja1">pavitaniṅ api<seg type="highlight">y</seg>utaṅ</rdg>
    . <rdg wit="#lo1">pavitaniṅ ahutaṅ</rdg>
    2445 <rdg wit="#le2">pavitan hutaṅ</rdg>
    .</app>
    .,
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">dene</lem>
    2450 <rdg wit="#ja1">deniṅ</rdg>
    .</app>
    .lobhane kaṅ ahutaṅ, nora
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">harəp anahura hutaṅ</lem>
    2455 <rdg wit="#ja1">rәp anahurana hutaṅe</rdg>
    .</app>
    .,
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">maliṅ</lem>
    2460 <rdg wit="#ja1">amaliṅ</rdg>
    .</app>
    .patra arane, añoloṅ rontal
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">esi</lem>
    2465 <rdg wit="#ja1"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg>
    .</app>
    .,
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #edj #edh">ḍəṇḍa</lem>
    2470 <rdg wit="#ja1">ḍəṇḍanәn</rdg>
    .</app>
    .pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh">amava</lem>
    2475 <rdg wit="#lo1">āṅrakṣa</rdg>
    .</app>
    .bhūmi, tur
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ja1 #edj #edh">saguṅiṅ</lem>
    2480 <rdg wit="#ma1">saguṅaṅ</rdg>
    .</app>
    .hutaṅ mulihanikəl mariṅ kaṅ
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ja1 #edj #edh">apihutaṅ</lem>
    2485 <rdg wit="#ma1">apiyutaṅ</rdg>
    .</app>
    ., kahilaṅane doṣane.</p>
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    . <!--
    2490
    . -->
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    .<p n="106">
    .riṅ voṅ huvus anahur hutaṅ pgat sahutaṅe, surat pavitan duruṅ kasəbit deniṅ apihutaṅ, duruṅ vinehakən rontale riṅ kaṅ ahutaṅ, akeh vəruh, yen huvus anahur hutaṅ, makādi aṅandəlakən iṅ ahutaṅ hana, sari-sari pinalaku pasusuratanipun tan den-vətokən, hana anəṅguh kamaliṅan, vaneh anəṅguh katunu riṅ api, riṅ voṅ maṅkana iya aniṅidakən patra arane, manih ta riṅ vuri mətu pasusuratan ikā, pinagihakən deniṅ anakiṅ apihutaṅ, yen hana voṅ anagih moṅkono ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi tur saguṅe panagihe valikna tagihən anikəl piṅro, vehakəna mariṅ kaṅ ahutaṅ, tkaniṅ pasusuratane ḍahutən; maṅkana doṣaniṅ anagih piṇḍo.</p>
    2495<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    . <!--
    .
    . -->
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    2500<p n="107">
    .riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ tan harəp anahura, katəmu deniṅ apihutaṅ, tagihən upasamanən iṅ manis iṅ ujar təmbehan, kapiṅro upayanən vətuvaniṅ hutaṅ, kapiṅtlu taṅtaṅen aucapan, kapiṅpat <app>
    .<lem>bañcananən</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">rañcananən?</rdg>
    .</app> sisilihana, kapiṅlima iridakəna konən anuṅgonana saguṅiṅ pisis.</p>
    2505
    .<p n="108">
    .riṅ apihutaṅ tumuli sāhasa aṅuṅkuṅ iṅ ahutaṅ, anakiṅ kinuṅkuṅ vadon rinusak hinalan, deniṅ apihutaṅ akā<unclear>ra</unclear>ṇa rəpe mariṅ voṅ vadon ikā, yen hana maṅkana aṅrusak ratna arane, ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi, voluṅ lakṣa, tur aveha tukon, nəm tali tikəlakəna piṅtlu; maṅkana śāsanane, liṅ bhagavān bhr̥gu.</p>
    .
    .<p n="109">
    2510riṅ voṅ apihutaṅ tan pasusuratan, akeh voṅ vəruh yen tan pasusuratan, vəkasan amanagihakən amətokən pasusuratan, lobha aran iṅ voṅ apihutaṅ moṅkono agave tan kapgatan iṅ surat ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, saguṅe panagihe valikna tagihən anikəl piṅro, vehakəna riṅ kaṅ tinagih.</p>
    .
    .<p n="110">
    .riṅ surat pavitan; rusak deniṅ bubuk, deniṅ əṅət, yen hilaṅa, yen katunon, aṅəlenana surat kaṅ ahutaṅ.</p>
    .
    2515<p n="111">
    .tukon iṅ rarā ucapən maṅke. riṅ rarā vinehan dr̥ve, mapakəna pinakatukone, vəkasan alaki iṅ len, vet iṅ rəpe riṅ lanaṅ len ikā, bapaniṅ rarā mənəṅ makādi yen amamaṅantenakna, iya amaraṅ laraṅan arane, salviraniṅ tukon iṅ aṅlamar karuhun mulihanikəl piṅro, tur bapaniṅ rarā ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, amadal tukon arane, kunəṅ ikaṅ alaki-rabi doṣanya pataṅ lakṣa kaṅ strī laki vivijinən denira saṅ prabhu.</p>
    .
    .<p n="112">
    .riṅ voṅ aveh tukon iṅ rarā, vəkasan mati rarā kaṅ tinuku ikā, tan amaṅsula tukon iṅ rarā mati, apan kapatyan vəlyan arane.</p>
    2520
    .<p n="113">
    .riṅ rarā vuruṅ patəmune duk sḍəṅe sapaturon, vuruṅ deniṅ lanaṅe kamalan, paran ta larane makavənaṅ vuruṅ iṅ patəmu? kumiṅ, tan kavaśa riṅ saṅgama, dudu lanaṅ, vuḍug riṅ vtəṅ, riṅ pupu, riṅ bobokoṅ, tan katon iṅ jaba larane, ayan, buyan iku ta vənaṅ pamadalakəna deniṅ rarā, riṅ rarā maṅkana amaṅsulakəna tukon nora anikəl.</p>
    .
    .<p n="114">
    2525riṅ anaṇḍa kbo sapi, yen anak-anakiṅ pasaṇḍan kaṅ anaṇḍakən ameta anake, yen duruṅ livat sakiṅ tluṅ tahun hiṅane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="115">
    .riṅ saṇḍa saviji, den-saṇḍakən iṅ voṅ roro, dene kaṅ anaṇḍakən, siṅ rumuhun anaṇḍa ameta saṇḍa iku vənaṅ, kaṅ anaṇḍakən ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    2530<p n="116">
    .voṅ anaṇḍakən savah sapcal, sumaṇḍa riṅ voṅ ro, barəṅ dene anaṇḍa, paḍa lavase siṅ amukti rumuhun
    .siddhākna pamuktine, kaṅ anaṇḍakən kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="117">
    2535riṅ sasaṇḍan vaḍah tambaga ādine, yen livat sakiṅ roṅ tahun lələb ikā</p>
    .
    .<p n="118">
    .yen hana kavula lanaṅ, vadon sinaṇḍakən dene gustine, <app>
    .<lem>añaloṅ</lem>
    2540<rdg wit="#edj">añoloṅ</rdg>
    .</app> dr̥ve<unclear>niṅ</unclear> kaṅ anaṇḍa sakiṅ luvene,
    .yan livat sakiṅ haji satus pañoloṅe riṅ dr̥veniṅ anaṇḍa, yogya patihane voṅ sinaṇḍakən ikā dene kaṅ anaṇḍa, iku voṅ anaṇḍakən corah arane, kaṅ anaṇḍakən anahura hutaṅe sasaṇḍan ikā, apurikaṅ anaṇḍakən ikā patine kavulane, yen lanaṅa, vadona sasaṇḍan ikā, dadi vyavahāra; vinicara kaṅ anaṇḍa aucapan, yogya doṣanana pati kaṅ anaṇḍakən denira saṅ prabhu, apan asaṇḍa maliṅ, makādi yen añoloṅa dr̥veniṅ anaṇḍa riṅ kālaniṅ vəṅi, patenana uga āgamane, yen alah dene abaribinan.</p>
    .
    .<p n="119">
    2545riṅ saṇḍa cinoloṅiṅ maliṅ riṅ pasimpənan yen alapəniṅ ratu paḍa kelaṅan āgamane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="120">
    .saṇḍa kavula lanaṅ, yen vadona, mun kalivat sakiṅ limaṅ tahun lələb, paḍa lavan dinol, kaṅ sakiṅ kuṭarāgama iki; yen sakiṅ mānavāgama sadaśa tahun lələb.</p>
    .
    2550<p n="121">
    .saṇḍa kbo-sapi, yen livat sakiṅ tluṅ tahun lələb paḍa lavan dinol, kaṅ sakiṅ kuṭarāgama iki; kaṅ sakiṅ mānavāgama limaṅ tahun lələb, salahtuṅgala tutən, dudu aranana aṅadeni, apan paḍa sakiṅ āgama riṅ kr̥ttayuga; riṅ mānavaśāstra, mahāraja manu aṅajarakən, mahuniṅ hana voṅ, samāna sira sākṣāt bhaṭāra viṣṇu; riṅ kuṭaraśāstra, bhagavān bhr̥gu aṅajarakən samaṅkaneṅ tretāyuga, sira sākṣāt bhaṭāra viṣṇu, tinut denira bhagavān rāma paraśu, tinut deniṅ rāt kabeh, dudu ginave maṅko, sipat sakiṅ śāstra mulaniṅ mula.</p>
    .
    .<p n="122">
    .riṅ dr̥ve, mas pinakādi, kinonkonakən iṅ apaṇḍe mas pahayunən, yen kaṅ bakal kinon gavenən bhūṣaṇa, paḍa kalavan dodot kinon radinana riṅ amalaṇṭəṅ, iṅalap deniṅ ratu, iṅalap deniṅ maliṅ, katunon, sakalviraniṅ kinonkonakən, aṅəlenana kaṅ kinonkon, yen sambarana pepeka dene aṅṣakṣa dr̥ve, muliha sarəgane kaṅ hilaṅ, yen yatna dene aṅrakṣa dr̥ve, abcik dene asimpən, tan paṅlenana; maṅkana dharmane.</p>
    2555
    .<p n="123">
    .riṅ voṅ aveh dr̥ve riṅ anak-mantune, duk sḍəṅe mahu aomah-omah, yen mati kaṅ vadon alapən dene lakine dr̥ve ika; yen mati kaṅ lanaṅ alapən dene rabine dr̥ve ikā, tan vənaṅ alapən deniṅ aveveh manih, yen huvus avor pomah-omahe; hiṅan iṅ avor alaki arabi rovlas tahun.</p>
    .
    .<p n="124">
    2560riṅ rarā vinehan dr̥ve deniṅ bapa dene sihe riṅ iya, vəkasan alaki rarā ikā, tan alavas palakine, vəkasan mati rarā ikā sadr̥ve kaṅ den-gava alaki ikā, muliha mariṅ bapa-ibuniṅ rarā, apan duruṅ avor palaki-rabine, maṅkana manih sadr̥veniṅ lanaṅ muliha mariṅ lanaṅ; maṅkana dharmane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="125">
    .yen hana voṅ elik iṅ mantune, tumuli anake den-pisahakən alaki-arabi, deniṅ tukon iṅ lanaṅ mulihanikəl piṅro, tur aṅulihakəna papəsəmbah sadulure riṅ kuna, vastra, sabuk, siñjaṅ, aṅsulakəna mariṅ mantu tan kinarepan, patuku-susu tan muliha.</p>
    .
    2565<p n="126">
    .riṅ rarā mahu vinaraṅ, duruṅ sapaturon lavan lakine, vet iṅ tan parəpe riṅ jajaka ikā, tukon iṅ rarā mulihanikəl piṅro, amadal saṅgama arane voṅ maṅkana.</p>
    .
    .<p n="127">
    .riṅ voṅ elik iṅ anake dene doṣane voṅ-atuvane vadon asor kavoṅane, siṅ doṣahaniṅ voṅ-atuvane vadon ikā, yen mati voṅ-atuvane lanaṅ, vənaṅ ikaṅ anak kinelikan ameta dr̥ve kaliliran iṅ bapa, putra anumpak arane, paṣa dumdumane lavan anak kaṅ kinasihan ikā, makādi yen kavalonakəna tur kavalone noranak-anak, anak kinelikan ikā uga aṅalapa dr̥vene rarāmane lanaṅ kabeh.</p>
    2570
    .<p n="128">
    .riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon mati, sadr̥vehane gustine uga ameta, siṅ dr̥vene, tan vənaṅ petən iṅ voṅ len; yen hana voṅ ahutaṅ iṅ kavula mati ikā, anavura riṅ gustine.</p>
    .
    .<p n="129">
    2575riṅ voṅ aṅaku kavulaniṅ akavula, liñok paṅakuñe, aṅhoho kavula arane, kaṅ aṅaku-aku, vənaṅ tagihən sapaṅajiniṅ voṅ kaṅ den-aku.</p>
    .
    .<p n="130">
    .riṅ voṅ aṅaku sanak riṅ voṅ vadon, kahapusan iṅ vadon karəpe, avəkasan makarabine voṅ vadon kaṅ den-aku kadaṅ ikā, akāraṇa den-valat; yen hana voṅ maṅkana patenana doṣane denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    2580<p n="131">
    .ulah iṅ voṅ den-prayatna aṅrakṣa anak-rabi, den-prayatna aṅrakṣa kavulane lanaṅ vadon, yen aulah salah ikaṅ rabi, anak, kavula lanaṅ vadon pamalərana uga, apan agave doṣaniṅ śarira yen tan pamalərana ulahe dudu ikā; hana po dene tan ahiḍəp vinalərakən, riṅ rabi, anak, lavan kavula təmbuṅən ta riṅ priṅ savilah, yen iṅ kakayuha, avake gitikən, yen gigire, sukune, manih tan ahiḍəp, talenana hayo asiṅsət, sarahina hiṅane, uvakna, yen kavula maṅkana, yan riṅ anak, rabi hayo tinalen, tan yogya ikā: hana po deniṅ anəmbaṅ anak rabi, muvah kavula, hayo anəmbaṅ śirahe, apan iṅ śarira, tan hana kadi uttamāṅga lvih təmən; riṅ anəmbuṅ śirahe voṅ ḍəṇḍa riṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen śirah atatu denyanəmbuṅ, yen tan patiha jəro ḍəṇḍa salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen emu aṅəmu gətih ḍəṇḍa limaṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi riṅ anəmbuṅ śirah ikā.</p>
    .
    .<p n="132">
    .riṅ voṅ aṅaku bhūmi, liñok paṅakune, ḍəṇḍa sakəṭi nəm lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, aṅaku-aku kadaṅ arane.</p>
    2585
    .<p n="133">
    .riṅ tan aveh miluha abhūmi riṅ kadaṅe, ḍəṇḍa sakəṭi nəm lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi; atulakadaṅ-varga
    .aran iṅ voṅ maṅkana.</p>
    .
    2590<p n="134">
    .ḍəṇḍaniṅ paradāra ucapən maṅke: paradara arane rabiniṅ voṅ len. voṅ aṅgaməli rabiniṅ arabi, sira saṅ prabhu riṅ kuna-kuna agave ḍəṇḍa, anuta sasḍəṅ iṅ doṣa, guṅiṅ ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa mariṅ adr̥ve rabi, patukune hurip kaṅ aṅgaməli, yen strī uttama; riṅ ḍəṇḍa salakṣa strī madhyama ikā, riṅ ḍəṇḍa limaṅ tali stri kaniṣṭa ikā, dudu saṅ prabhu aṅalap ḍəṇḍa ikā, kaṅ adr̥ve rabi viśeṣa riṅ ḍəṇḍa, yen harəpisis, kunəṅ duk sḍəṅe aṅgaməli karuhan dene kaṅ arabi, vənaṅ patihaniṅ aṅgaməli.</p>
    .
    .<p n="135">
    .voṅ amuṅpaṅ rabiniṅ arabi, den-tut mariṅ gənah iṅ voṅ vadon ikā, vetniṅ rəpe kaṅ amuṅpaṅ, doṣane kaṅ amuṅpaṅ doṣa pati denira saṅ amava, bhūmi.</p>
    2595
    .<p n="136">
    .riṅ voṅ mariṅ paturon iṅ rabiniṅ arabi karəpe aṅalonana, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa yen luput ikaṅ rabi den-aloni, ḍəṇḍa mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve rabi, patukune hurip kaṅ harəp aṅalonana, yen kəna dene aṅaloni ḍəṇḍa pati dene kaṅ adr̥ve rabi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="137">
    2600riṅ voṅ aṅgaməli rabiniṅ arabi, tur aṅaloni pisan, hana kaṅ akon aṅalonana riṅ umah iṅ voṅ kaṅ akon gənahe aṅaloni, kaṅ adr̥ve umah suka gənah iṅ aṅaloni ḍəṇḍanən kaṅ adr̥ve umah, roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kaṅ aṅaloni doṣa pati riṅ laki kaṅ iṅalonan ikā, yen sakiṅ mānava iki; yen sakiṅ kuṭara, kaṅ aṅaloni doṣa pati, yen harəp ahuripa ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, kaṅ akon tur aṅajani aṅalonana riṅ umahe, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="138">
    .riṅ voṅ anilih paṅaṅgo riṅ rabiniṅ arabi riṅ aspi, vəkasan kavr̥tta riṅ voṅ akeh, kaṅ anilih
    .ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa dene kaṅ adr̥ve rabi.</p>
    2605
    .<p n="139">
    .riṅ voṅ aucap-ucap lavan rabiniṅ aspi, harəp ahutaṅa ujare ḍəṇḍanən salakṣa, mantaṅe riṅ voṅ; hayo
    .aucap-ucap lavan rabiniṅ arabi, laraṅan iṅ alaraṅan riṅ aspi, apan evəh riṅ smara pinamaləran; yadyan paṇḍita
    .tuvi, hayo sira sapocapan lavan strī riṅ aspi, apan iṅ samuhaniṅ indriya śakti dahat, evuh lināvan halaniṅ tan rumakṣa riṅ indriya, hilaṅ ikaṅ kapaṇḍitan, yan linumbar; maṅkana liṅ saṅ hyaṅ āgama.</p>
    2610
    .<p n="140">
    .voṅ vadon aṅiriṅakən rarā, den-atərakən mariṅ umah iṅ jajaka, manih hana voṅ vadon aveh gənah, deniṅ jajaka lavan rarā atəmu tan sareh, saṅkane aveh gənah ikā den-upah-upahi deniṅ jajaka lavan rarā ikā, ikā ta kaṅ aṅatərakən rarā, kaṅ aveh gənah, karoroṅ vadon ikā ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ evu de*nira saṅ amava bhūmi, kahilaṅane doṣane.
    . <!--* Manchester breaks off here, <witEnd target="#ma1"></witEnd>?--></p>
    .
    2615<p n="141">
    .riṅ voṅ aṅgaməli rarā, aṅajak atatavan, amamanis iṅ ujar, aṅajak mariṅ aspi, momah-omahan arane; ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen hana voṅ maṅkana.</p>
    .
    .<p n="142">
    .riṅ voṅ atukar lavan rabiniṅ arabi, akeh voṅ vəruh patukare, riṅ voṅ lanaṅ maṅkana strīsaṅgrahana arane, ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa mariṅ adr̥ve rabi; riṅ voṅ atukar lavan rarā cilik ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa mariṅ saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi.</p>
    2620
    .<p n="143">
    .śāsananiṅ alaki arabi, yen luṅhā apaparan, mintar alayar, sapuluh tahun hiṅane lavase luṅhā, mintar aṅulati pisis deśāntara, pataṅ tahun hiṅane lavase luṅhā, mintar aṅaji sarvaśāstra nəm tahun lavase luṅhā; hana ta voṅ luṅhā atiṅgal rabine, tan alayar, tan aṅulati pisis, makadon dadiya pomah-omah, tan luṅhā aṅaji sarvaśāstra, yen hana voṅ maṅkana rabine aṅantiya pataṅ tahun; yan livat sakiṅ pataṅ tahun vənaṅ alakia riṅ len; liṅ iṅ mānavaśāstra maṅkana; yan iṅ kuṭaraśāstra tluṅ tahun, vənaṅ alakiya riṅ len, lakine purvaka tan vənaṅ yen andoṣanana, ujar iṅ āgama; pinisahakən iṅ hyaṅ arane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="144">
    2625riṅ voṅ aṇḍahut savi, anəbit paṅubaya, yen duruṅ pgat iṅ vicara, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ tali aməraṅ savi sakiṅ agalak, tur anaṅtaṅ ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="145">
    .riṅ voṅ asḍahan vəvənaṅ sakiṅ gusti, lvire paksi, camra, celeṅ, bañak, vḍus, kbo-sapi pagave, yen mati, yen hilaṅa, dene aləṅe sinəḍah-sḍahan aṅlenana pisis voluṅ tali sanuṅgal-nuṅgal sakehaniṅ mati lavan hilaṅ, maṅkana śāsanane; nora vəruh duk sḍəṅe hilaṅ, nora vəruh duk sḍəṅe mati gagaḍuhane, ḍəṇḍanən limaṅ tali; vəruh tur noravavarah, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa, yen aṅkara ujare ḍəṇḍa roṅ lakṣa, yen aniṅidakən tur den-paṅani kaṅ vənaṅ-vənaṅ, patenana denira saṅ adr̥ve vənaṅ-vənaṅ, makādi sira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    2630<p n="146">
    .riṅ voṅ asḍahan kbo sapi, yen aləṅe paṅrakṣane, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa, paṅrəga riṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal
    .voluṅ tali, yen sakiṅ paravaśaniṅ asḍahan, ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="147">
    2635riṅ kbo agalak aniṅhat voṅ rva, tlu, pat, iku kbo aṅamuk arane, vənaṅ rəbutən dagiṅe yen huvus mati, yen hana kbo atavan-tatu, pgat sakiṅ pamugərane, yen pinugər kinəluhan, yan amgatatali, aniṅhat ikā, dudu aranana aṅamuk, yen hana andalih aṅamuk iriya, kbo sapi maṅkana rəbutən dagiṅe kbo sapi mulihanikəl piṅro, tuvi yan tan paniṅhat kbo sapi ikā tur pinaten, mulihanikəl uga, kaṅ amateni ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="148">
    .yen hana kbo sapi paṅirid, ajaran, gajah, salviraniṅ paməṅ-aməṅan saṅ prabhu, aveh sukha riṅ sira dene gunane, rupane, varṇane, tuhu-tuhu riṅ rājadr̥ve, ikā ta yen cinoloṅ iṅ voṅ, pinaten deniṅ voṅ, tan kəna hiṅhanana rəgane, ḍəṇḍane kaṅ amateni, kaṅ añoloṅ, hiṅan denira saṅ prabhu riṅ kaṅ amateni lavan kaṅ añoloṅ, apan sira viśeṣa amava bhūmi, vənaṅ sakarəp ira, arane sakiṅ śāstra svāmī doṣaprada, aṅhiṅ, yen sira harəp aṇḍəṇḍa riṅ pisis, tutugiṅ ḍəṇḍa tan hana manih sakəṭi nəm lakṣa, tan hana aṅləvihi manih guṅiṅ ḍəṇḍa, yen śakiṅ āgamaśāstra, riṅ ḍəṇḍa, yan aṅləvihi
    .sakiṅ sakəṭi nəm lakṣa, ila-ila, tan ulahanira saṅ amava rāt aṅləvihana, yen anut ujar śāstra kuṭara-mānava.</p>
    2640<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    . <!--
    .
    . -->
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    2645<p n="149">
    .riṅ voṅ adoṣa, mati duruṅ ta katkan dinoṣan, tan tumusa doṣane riṅ anake.</p>
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    . <!--
    .@@A (le1): riṁ voṁṅ aṅ{ba}/h\ə{ṅə}/ba\ṅ{ba}-/h\əbaṁ, hasaṅgup haveha pisis·, dadi pasusuratan·, huvus prasidḍa gavene, duruṁṅ aveḥ paṅhəbaṅ-həbaṁ, ma:ti kaṁṅ ab:həbaṅ-həbaṁ, nora vnaṁ tumusa riṁṅ hanakke,, 0 ,,
    2650@@B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṁ, ha- [28-24]saṅgup aveha pisis·, dadi pasusuratan·, huvus prasidḍa: ga- [28-25]vene, duruṁ haveḥ paṅhəbaṅ-h<subst><del rend="corrected">i</del><add place="overstrike">ә</add></subst>baṁ, mati kaṅ aṅhəbaṁ-hbaṁ, nora vnaṁ [28-26]<margin hand="roman">151</margin>tumusa tkeṁ hanake ,, 0 ,,
    .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁ haṅəbaṁ-həbaṁ hasaṅgup aveha pisis· dadi pasu- [51-16]suratan·, huvus prasiḍa gavene, duruṁṅ aveḥ paṅhəbaṅ-hәbaṁ, [51-17]nora tumusa tkan iṁṅ anake ,, 0 ,,
    .@@L (lo1): riṁ voṁ haṅəbaṅ-həbaṁ, hasaṅgup haveha pisis·, dadḍi pasusuratan· [margin-left-1: 51] [margin-left-2: , voṅ aṅutaṁ, ta-] [margin-left-3: n paveḥ kalanta-] [margin-left-4: ra,] [margin-right-1-roman: 51] [51v1], vuvus prasidḍa gavene, duruṁ haveḥ paṅəbaṅ-həbaṁ, mati kaṅ aṅəbaṅ-əbaṁ, nora vnaṁ tumusa: tkeṁ hanake || 0 ||
    .@@M (ma1): -
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ haṅəbaṁ, hasaṅgup haveha pisis·, dadine hasusuratanan·, vuvu- [17r-04]s prasiḍa gavene, duruṁ haveḥ paṅəbaṁ-ṅəbaṁ, nora vnaṁ tumusa riṁ ha- [17r-05]nake ,, 0 ,,
    2655@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ, asaṅgup aveha pisis, dadi pasusuratan, huvus prasiddha gavene, duruṅ aveh paṅhəbaṅ–həbaṅ, māti kaṅ aṅhəbaṅ–həbaṅ, nora vənaṅ tumusa təka riṅ anake.
    .@@H (edH): riṅ voṅ aṅəbaṅ-əbaṅ, ansaṅgup aveha pisis, dadi pasusuratan, huvus prasiddha gavene, duruṅ aveh paṅəbaṅ–əbaṅ, mati kaṅ aṅəbaṅ–əbaṅ, nora vənaṅ tumusa təkeṅ anake.
    . -->
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    .<p n="150">
    2660<app>
    .<lem>
    . <app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #edj #edh">riṅ voṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#ja1">riṅ voṅ haṅəbaṅ</rdg>
    2665 </app>
    . , asaṅgup aveha pisis,
    . <app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #edj #edh">dadi pasusuratan,</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#ja1">dadine hasusuratanan</rdg>
    2670 </app>
    . huvus prasiddha gavene, duruṅ aveh paṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ,
    . <app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #lo1 #edj #edh">māti kaṅ aṅhəbaṅ-həbaṅ</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#le3 #ja1"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg>
    2675 </app>
    .<!-- Given the identical copyist error, could it be that witnesses ja and le3 belong to the same line of textual transmission — even though further along in the text their readings begin to diverge? -->
    . ,
    . <app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #le2 #lo1 #ja1 #edj #edh">nora vənaṅ tumusa</lem>
    2680 <rdg wit="#le3">nora tumusa</rdg>
    . </app>
    . <app>
    . <lem wit="#le2 #lo1 #edh">təkeṅ anake</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#le1 #ja1">riṅ anake</rdg>
    2685 <rdg wit="#le3">tkan iṅ anake</rdg>
    . <rdg wit="#edj">təka riṅ anake</rdg>
    . </app>
    . .
    .</lem>
    2690<rdg wit="#ma1"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg>
    .</app>
    .</p>
    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ma1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    . <!--
    2695@@A (le1): riṁ voṁ[fn: 3{8}/7\][37r1]ṅ ahutaṁ tan paveḥ kalantara-putra, mariṁṅ apihutaṁ, hanikəl piṁro huga hutaṅe, savuse hanikəl piṁro, tan hana panapuanare, riṁ vo maṅkana hanutakna hutaṅe, dadi kavula, halavas ḍene hanutakə[37r2]n dadi kavula, tan kavaśa dene hanambut-gaveniṁ pr̥dana, vkasan miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, katmu maniḥ [SH] deniṁ pr̥dana, Aveha pavadal gave salavase tan aṅlakoniṁ gaveniṁ pr̥dana, vkasan mati riṁ sukuniṁ [37r3] gusti, Anake hanahura hutaṁṅ{e} anikəl pi/taling\ra:,
    .@@B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ ahutaṁ tan paveḥ [28-27]kalantara putra, mariṁṅ apihutaṁ, han<subst><del rend="corrected">ә</del><add place="overstrike">i</add></subst>kəl piṁ ro hu<add place="above">ga</add><del>taṁ</del> hutaṅe, [28-28] IMG_0671 <pb n="29"/><fw n="29" place="top-left"><num value="29">29</num></fw> [29-01]savuse hanikəl piṁ ro, tan hana panahure, riṁ voṁ maṅkana hanūtakna [29-02]hutaṅe, dadi kavula, halavas dene hanūtakən dadi kavula, tan ka- [29-03]vaṣa dene hanambut gaveniṁ pr̥dana, vkasan miṅgat·, sakiṁ guṣṭine, ka- [29-04]tmu maniḥ deniṁ pr̥ḍa:na, haveha pavadal gave salav<del>e</del>ase tan aṅla- ⌈ [29-05]koni gaveniṁ pr̥ḍa:na, vkasan ma:ti riṁ sukuniṁ guṣṭi, Anake hanahu- [29-06]<margin hand="roman">152</margin>ra hutaṅ anikәl piṁḍo ,, 0 ,,
    .@@C (le3): riṁ voṁṅ ahutaṁ tan aveḥ kalantara putra mariṁṅ apihutaṁ, [38-22]hanikəl piṁ ro huga hutaṅe, savuse hanikəl piṁ ro, tan ana pva pa- [38-23]navure, riṁ voṁ maṅkana:, hanūtakna hutaṅe, dadi kavula:, halava- [38-24]s dene hanūtakən dadi kavula:, tan kavaśa dene hanambut gaveniṁ pra- [38-25]ḍana:, vkasan miṅgat· sakiṁ gustine, katmu maniḥ deniṁ praḍana:, have- [38-26]ha pavadal gave salavase tan aṅlakoni gaveniṁ praḍana:, vkasa- IMG_0115 <pb n="39"/><fw n="39" place="top-right"><num value="39">39</num></fw> [39-01]<margin hand="roman">152</margin>n mati riṁ sukuniṁ gusti, Anake hana:hur utaṁ hanikəl piṁro,, 0 ,,
    .@@L (lo1): riṁ voṁ hahutaṁ tan paveḥ kalanta: [51v2]ra: putra:, mariṁ apihutaṁ, hanikəl piṁ ro huga: hutaṅe, savuse hanikəl piṁ ro, tan ana panahure, riṁ voṁ maṅkana: hanuta:kna: hutaṅe, dadḍī [51v3]kavula:, halavas dene hanuta:kən dadḍī kavula:, tan kavaśa: dene hanambut gaveniṁ pr̥ḍana:, vkasan miṅgat· sakiṁ gustine, katmu maniḥ deniṁ pr̥ḍa- [51v4]na:, haveha: pavaḍal gave, salavaśe tan aṅlakonī gaveniṁ pr̥ḍana:, vkasan matī ri sukuniṁ gustī, Anake hanahura: hutaṁṅ hanikəl pinḍo ||
    .@@M (ma1): -
    2700@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ hahutaṁ tan paveḥ putra: kalantara:, mariṁ hadr̥ve piyutaṁ [17r-07]hanikəl piṁ ro huga hutaṅe, savuvuse hanikəl piṁ ro, tan a- [17r-08]na pana:vure, riṁ voṁ maṅkaṇa hanutakna huga hutaṅe, dadi kahu- [17r-09]la lavas·, dene dadi kahula:, tan kavaśa dene hana:mbut ga- [17r-10]veniṁ praḍaṇa:, vkasan miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, katmu maniḥ deniṁ prraḍa- [17r-11]na:, haveha pavḍal gave salavase, tan aṅlakoni gaveniṁ pra- [17r-12]daṇa, vkasan mati riṁ sukuniṁ gusti, hanake tan avurana huga hutaṅe ha- [17r-13]nikəl piṁ ro ,, 0 ,,
    .@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ tan paveh kalāntara putra mariṅ apihutaṅ, anikəl piṅro uga hutaṅe, savuse anikəl piṅro, tan hana panahure, riṅ voṅ maṅkana anutakəna hutaṅe, dadi kavula; alavas dene anutakən dadi kavula tan kavaśa dene anambut-gave niṅ pr̥dana, vəkasan miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, katəmu manih deniṅ pr̥dana, aveha pavadal gave salavase tan aṅlakoni gaveniṅ pr̥dana, vəkasan mati riṅ sukuniṅ gusti, anake anahura hutaṅ anikəl piṅro.
    .@@H (edH): riṅ voṅ ahutaṅ tan paveh kalāntara putra, mariṅ apihutaṅ, anikəl piṅro hutaṅe, savuse anikəl piṅro, tan ana panahure, riṅ voṅ maṅkana anutakəna utaṅe, dadi kavula, alavas dene anutakən dadi kavula, tan kavaśa dene nambut-gave niṅ pradana, vəkasan miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, katəmu manih deniṅ pradana, aveh pavadal gave, salavase tan aṅlakoni gave niṅ pradana, vəkasan mati riṅ sukuniṅ gusti, anake anahura utaṅ anikəl piṅro.
    . -->

    . <!--
    .@@A (le1): riṁṅ kahula lanaṁ-vadon·, hanak-a{*}nakiṁ daganiṁ gusti, yen iṁ paradeśa sagnaḥhane hanak{e}-anak·, hiku hanak vəsi harane, Anakiṁ kavula sa- [37v1] tuvuk aṅavula, liṁ saṁ paṇḍita, haśevakaha riṁ{ṅa}ṅ a:nakiṁ tuhan uga kramane, riṁ kavula lanaṁ-vadon a:nak vəsi, Aṅalapa hutaṁ sa{t}\h/uṅe ra:mane lanaṁ-vadon aməpəka, Atuṅgalana, den-paḍa pa[37v2]dum-ḍumane, maṅkana ḍarmmane,,
    .@@B (le2): riṁ kahula lanaṁ vadon·, Anak-a- [29-07]nak i daga(ni) gusṭi, yan aparadeśa: hagnahe, sagnah anak-anak·, hi- [29-08]ku Anak vəsi harane, Anakiṁ kavula satuvuk aṅavula, liṁ saṁ p<subst><del rend="corrected">i</del><add place="overstrike">a</add></subst>ṇḍi- [29-09]<margin hand="roman">152b</margin>ttha, Asevaka: riṁṅ anakiṁ tuvan uga kramane ,, 0 ,, riṁ kahula la- [29-10]naṁ vadon a:nak vəsi, Aṅalapa hutaṁ sahutaṅe ramane lanaṁ vado- [29-11]n aməpəka, Atuṅgalana, den-pa{?}ḍa padum-dumane, maṅkana ḍarmmane,,
    2810@@C (le3): riṁ kavu- [39-02]la lanaṁ vadon· hanak-anakiṁ daganiṁ gusti, yen iṁ paradeśa gnahe, [39-03]sagnahe hanak-anak·, hiku hanak vəśi harane, Anakiṁ kavula satuvu- [39-04]k aṅavula:, liṁ saṁ paṇḍita, Aśevakaha riṅ anakiṁ tuha:n uga krama- ⌈ [39-05]<margin hand="roman">152b/margin>ne ,, 0 ,, riṁ kavula lanaṁ vadon a:nak vəsi, Aṅalapa hutaṁ sahutaṅe ra- [39-06]mane lanaṁ vadon aməpəka:, Atuṅgalana:, den-paḍa <add place="above">pa</add>dum-ḍumane, maṅka:- [39-07]<margin hand="roman">262/margin>na: ḍarmmane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@L (lo1): riṁ kavula: lanaṁ vadon· hanak-a:nakiṁ ḍaganiṁ gustī, yen iṁ paradeśa: ha:gnahe, sagnah{e}ane hanak-ana:k·, hiku hanak vəsi harane, hanakiṁ [52r2]kavula: satuhuk haṅavula:, liṁ saṁ paṇḍita:, haśevaka:ha: riṁ hanakiṁ tuvan uga: kramane || 0 || riṁ kavula: lanaṁ vadon· hanak vəsī, haṅalapa: hutaṁ§ [52r3]sahutaṅe ramane lanaṁ vadon aməpəka:, hatuṅgalana:, den-paḍa: padum-ḍumane, maṅkana: ḍarmmane || 0 ||
    .@@M (ma1): -
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ kahula lanaṁ vadon·, hanak-anakiṁ ḍaganiṁ gusti, yan iṁ paradeṣa: [17r-15]gnahe, sagnahe nak-a:naka, hiku hanak vəṣi harane, hanakiṁṅ a:ṅa- [17r-16]hula satuhukiṁṅ aṅahula:, liṁ sapanḍita, haṣehvaka riṁ hanakiṁ [17r-17]tuvan ugra: hakramane, riṁ kahula lanaṁ vadon· hanak vəsi, [17r-18]haṅa:lapa hutaṅe sahutaṁ raramane lanaṁ vadon· haməpəka, [17r-19]hatuṅgulan· den-paḍa dum-ḍum ḍul-ḍumane, maṅkaṇa ḍa:rmane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@J (edJ): riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon, anak-anak iṅ daganiṅ gusti yen iṅ paradeśaha, sagənahane anak-anak, iku anak vəsi arane, anakiṅ kavula satuhuk aṅavula, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, asevakaha riṅ anakiṅ tuhan uga, kramane. riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon, anak vəsi, aṅalapa hutaṅ sahutaṅe rāmane lanaṅ vadon, aməpəka atuṅgalana, den-paḍa padum-dumane, maṅkana dharmane.
    2815@@H (edH): riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon, anak-anak iṅ dagan iṅ gusti, yen iṅ paradeśaha agnahe, sagənahәne anak-anak, iku anak vəsi arane, anakiṅ kavula satuhuk aṅavula, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, asevakaha riṅ anakiṅ tuvan uga, kramane. riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon anak vəsi, aṅalapa hutaṅ sahutaṅe rāmane lanaṅ vadon aməpəka, atuṅgalana, den-paḍa padum-dumane, maṅkana darmane.
    . -->

    2900<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #lo1 #ja1 #edj #edh -->
    . <!--
    .@@A (le1): riṁ kavula lanaṁ-vadon· miṅgat· sakiṁ gustine, kaṁ lanaṁ {k}/m\i\ṅ/gat sakiṁ gu{sa}[SH]stine, kaṁ vadon miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, Atəmu riṁ paṅiṅgatane, vkasan hanak-anak·, kaṁ lanaṁ katmu de[37v3]niṁṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁ, kaṁ vadon katəmu de{*}ne kaṁṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon·, katmu riṁ desa len·, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁ hameta Anake lanaṁ, kaṁ{ṅa}ṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon ameta ha[fn: 38][38r1]nake vadon·,, yen karuṅhun mati kavula lanaṁṅ ika, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula naṁṅ ameta sadr̥vene saR̥mbat·, kavula vadon ika muliha mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon·,, yen kavula vadon i[38r2]ka mati, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon aṅalap adr̥vene sasuhun·, kavula lanaṁ muli[SH]ha mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula naṁ, maṅkana ḍarmmane,,
    .@@B (le2): riṁ kavula lanaṁ vadon miṅgat· sakiṁṅ gusṭine, kaṁ vadon miṅgat sakiṁ gusṭine, Atmu riṁ paṅiṅgatane, vka- [29-13]san hanak-anak·, kaṁ lanaṁ katmu deniṁṅ kaṅ adr̥ve rovaṁ lanaṁ, kaṁ va- [29-14]don katmu dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon·, katmu riṁ deśa [29-15]len·, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁ, hameta Anake lanaṁ, kaṅ adra- ⌈ [29-16]ve kavula vadon <del>·</del> ameta hanake vadon·, yen karuhun mati [29-17]kavula lanaṅ ika:, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁṅ ameta sadr̥vene [29-18]saR̥mbat·, kavula vadon ika: muliha mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula [29-19]vadon·, yen kavula vadon ika mati, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula va- ⌈ [29-20]don aṅalapa dr̥vene sasuhun·, kavula lanaṁ muliha mariṁ kaṅ a- [29-21]<margin hand="roman">154</margin>dr̥ve kavula lanaṁ, maṅkana ḍarmmane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@C (le3): riṁ kavula lanaṁ vadon miṅgat sa- [48-03]kiṁ gustine, kaṁ lanaṁ miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, kaṁ vadon miṅgat sakiṁ [48-04]gustine, hatmu riṁ paṅiṅgatane, vkasan hanak-anak·, kaṁ lanaṁ [48-05]katmu dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁ, kaṁ vadon katmu de- [48-06]ne kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon·, katmu riṁ deṣa len·, ka- [48-07]ṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁ hameta hanake lanaṁ, kaṅ adr̥ve ka- [48-08]vula vadon ameta hanake vadon·, yan mati karuhun kavu- [48-09]la lanaṅ ika:, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁṅ ika: hameta dr̥ve- [48-10]ne saR̥mbat·, kavula vadon muliha mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula [48-11]vadon ika:, yen kavula vadon ika: mati rumuhun·, kaṁṅ a- [48-12]ṅadr̥ve kavula vadon ika hamet dr̥vene sasuhun·, [48-13]kavula lanaṁ muliha mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ ika:, [48-14]<margin hand="roman">154</margin>maṅkana ḍarmmane ,, 0 ,,
    2905@@L (lo1): riṁ kavula: lanaṁ vadon miṅgat·, sakiṁ gu- [52r4]stī, kaṁ kaṁ lanaṁ miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, kaṁ vadon miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, hatmū riṁ paṅiṅgatan·, vkasan hanak-hanak·, kaṁ lanaṁ katəmu deniṁ kaṅ hadr̥ve ka-[52v1]vula: lanaṁ, kaṁ vadon katəmu dene kaṅ hadr̥ve kavula: vadon·, katmu riṁ deśa len·, kaṅ ha:dr̥ve kavula: lanaṁ hameta: hanake la- [52v2]naṁ, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula: vadon· hameta: hanake vadon·, yen karuhun matī kavula: lanaṁṅ ika:, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula: lanaṁ hameta: sadr̥⌈ [52v3]vene saR̥mbat·, kavula: vadon ika: muliha: mariṁ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula: vadon·. yen kavula: vadon ika: matī, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula: vadon ha- [52v4]ṅalapa: dr̥vene sasuhun·, kavula: lanaṁ muliha: mariṁ kaṅ ha:dr̥ve kavula: lanaṁ, maṅkana: ḍarmmane || 0 ||
    .@@M (ma1): -
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ kahula lanaṁ vadon·, miṅgat sakiṁ gusti, kahula lanaṁ mi- [17r-21]ṅgat sakiṁ gustine, katmu sakiṁ paṅiṅgatan·, vkas hanak-anak· [17r-22]kaṁ lanaṁ katmu deniṁ hadr̥ kahula lanaṁ, kaṁ vadon katmu deniṁ [17r-23]kaṅ a:dr̥ve hakahula vadon·, katmu riṁ deṣa len·, [17r-24]kaṅ a:dr̥ve kahula lanaṁ, hameta hanake lanaṁ, kaṅ adr̥ve <pb n="18"/><fw n="18" place="top"><num value="18">18</num></fw> [18v-01]kahula vadon·, hameta hanake kaṁ vadon·, yen karuhun mati kahula [18v-02]lanaṁṅ ika, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṁ hika, hameta druvene sa- [18v-03]R̥bat·, kahula vadon hika: muliha mariṁ kahula vadon· [18v-04]dr̥vene, yen karuhun vadon ika: mati, kaṅ a:dr̥ve ka- [18v-05]vula: vadon hika: hameta dr̥vene sasuhun· kahula lanaṁ [18v-06]muliha mariṁṅ adr̥ve kahula lanaṁ, maṅkaṇa darmmane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@J (edJ): riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon miṅgat sakiṅ gustine kaṅ lanaṅ miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, kan vadon miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, atəmu riṅ paṅiṅgatane, vəkasan anak-anak, kaṅ lanaṅ katəmu deniṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ, kaṅ vadon katəmu dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon, katəmu riṅ deśa len, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ ameta anake lanaṅ, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon ameta anake vadon; yen karuhun mati kavula lanaṅ ikā, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ ameta sadr̥vene sarəmbat, kavula vadon ikā muliha mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon, yen kavula vadon ikaṅ mati, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon aṅalapa dr̥vene sasuhun, kavula lanaṅ muliha mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ, maṅkana dharmane.
    .@@H (edH): riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon miṅgat, sakiṅ gustine, kaṅ lanaṅ miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, kaṅ vadon miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, atəmu riṅ paṅiṅgatane, vəkasan anak-anak. kaṅ lanaṅ katəmu deniṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ, kaṅ vadon katəmu dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon, katəmu riṅ deśa len, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ ameta anake lanaṅ, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon ameta anake vadon, yen karuhun mati kavula lanaṅ ikā, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ ameta sadr̥vene sarəmbat, kavula vadon ikā muliha mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon. yen kavula vadon ika mati, kaṅ adr̥ve kavula vadon aṅalapa dr̥ve sasuhun, kavula lanaṅ muliha mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kavula lanaṅ, maṅkana darmane.
    2910 -->

    . <!--
    .@@A (le1): riṁ kavula lanaṁ vadon tuṅgal· gnahe haṅavu[38r3]la, miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, Alavas ḍene luṅha, Aṅher iṁ deśa len·, Alapən sadr̥vene, vəvnaṁṅ{ṅa}e, Anake dene kaṁṅ adr̥ve kavula, vadalana gave salavase maṅgat·, kaṁ lanaṁ pavada\l/ gave [38v1] satus· riṁ sadina,, kaṁ vadon pavadal gave, save riṁ sadina, maṅkana liṁ saṁ paṇḍita,,
    .@@B (le2): riṁ kavula lanaṁ va- ⌈ [29-22]don tuṅg<subst><del rend="corrected">u</del><add place="overstrike">a</add></subst>l·, gnahe haṅavula, miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, Alavas de- ⌈ [29-23]ne luṅha:, Aṅher iṁ deśa len·, Alapən sadr̥vene, vəvnaṁṅe, [29-24]Anake, dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula, vadalana gave salava- [29-25]se miṅgat·, kaṁ lanaṁ pavaḍal gave satus riṁ sadina,, kaṁ vado- [29-26]n pavadal gave, save riṁ sadina, maṅkana liṁ saṁ paṇḍita ,, 0 ,,
    .@@C (le3): riṁ kavula lanaṁ vadon· tuṅgal· [48-15]gnahe haṅavula:, miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, halavas dene [48-16]luṅha:, haṅeriṁ deśa len·, Alapən sadr̥vene, vəvna- ⌈ [48-17]ṅe, <del>patlunәn deniṅ adum·, kaṁ roṁ duman den-pata dene kaṁ haṅalap daśih ika:,</del>hanake, dene kaṅ adr̥ve [48-18]kavula:, vadalana gave salavase miṅgat·, kaṁ lanaṁ [48-19]pavadalana gave satus·, riṁ sadina:, kaṁ vadon· pava- [48-20]dalana gave save riṁ sadina:, maṅkana liṁ saṁ paṇḍita: ,, 0 ,,
    3055@@L (lo1): riṁ kavula: lanaṁ vadon tuṅgal·, [53r1]gnahe haṅavula:, miṅgat sakiṁ gustine, halavas dene luṅha:, haṅeriṁ deśa len·, Alapən sadr̥vene, vəvnaṅe, hanake, dene kaṅ ha:dr̥ve kavu- [53r2]la:, vaḍalana gave śalavaśe miṅga{t}t·, kaṁ lanaṁ pavaḍal gave satus· riṁ sadina:,, kaṁ vadon pavadal gave, save riṁ sadina:, maṅkana: liṁ saṁ paṇḍittha
    .@@M (ma1):
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ kahula lanaṁ vadon· tuṅgal gәnahe haṅavula, miṅgat sakiṁ gu- [18v-08]stine halavas· dene luṅha haṅher riṁ deṣa len·, halapə- [18v-09]n sadr̥vene, vəvnaṅe, hanake dene lanaṁ vadon·, de- [18v-10]ne kaṅ a:dr̥ve kahula:, veha pagave de salavase luṅṅa,, kaṁ la- [18v-11]na mavḍal gave satus·, kaṁ sadiṇa:, kaṁ vadon· mavḍal gave sekә- [18v-12]t·, kaṁ sadiṇa:, maṅkaṇa: liṁ saṁ panḍita: ,, 0 ,,
    .@@J (edJ): riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon tuṅgal gənahe aṅavula miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, alavas dene luṅhā, aṅher iṅ deśa len, alapən sadr̥vene, vəvənaṅe, anake dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula, vadalana gave salavase miṅgat, kaṅ lanaṅ pavadal gave satus riṅ sadina, kaṅ vadon pavadal gave save riṅ sadina; maṅkana liṅ saṅ paṇḍita.
    .@@H (edH): riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon tuṅgal gənahe aṅavula, miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, alavas dene luṅhā, aṅәr iṅ deśa len. alapən sadr̥vene, vəvənaṅe, anake, dene kaṅ adr̥ve kavula, vadalana gave salavase miṅgat, kaṅ lanaṅ pavadal gave satus riṅ sadina, kaṅ vadon pavadal gave, save riṅ sadina; maṅkana liṅ saṅ paṇḍita.

    . <!--
    .@@A (le1): riṁ voṅ arabi riṁ kavulane, Anak-anak kavula hika, A/na\ke nora milu riṁṅ utaṅe kavula vadon ika:, no[38v2]ra milu dr̥veniṁ bapa, yen tan anak-anak·, po voṁ lanaṁṅ ika lavan rabine sasane voṁ [SH] menak ika, Anak iṁ dasiḥ vnaṁṅ aṅalilirana sadr̥veniṁ l{e}anaṁ {ui ha} me{ta}/nak·\, hanahura maniḥ hutaṁ saki [38v3] kavula dasih ika, maṅkana ḍarmmane,,
    .@@B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ arabi riṁ kavulane, Anak-anakavula hika:, Anake [30-01]nora milu riṁṅ utaṅe kavula vadon ika:, nora milu dr̥veniṁ bapa, ye- [30-02]n tan anak-anak· po voṁ lanaṅ ika: lavan abine samane voṁ mena- [30-03]k ika, Anakiṁ dasi vnaṁṅ aṅalilirana ] kiṁ voṁ len·, AR̥p aphuripane ra- [30-04]dr̥/ve\ne lanaṁ menak·, hanahurana: hutaṁ maniḥ hanakiṁ ḍaśih ika:, maṅkana: ḍarmmane
    3115@@C (le3): still unidentified
    .@@L (lo1): riṁ voṁ harabī riṁ kavula:ne, hanak-anakavula: hika:, hanake nora milu riṁṅ utaṅe kavula: vadon ika:, nora milu dr̥veniṁ ba [53r4]pa, yen tan anak-a:nak· po voṁ lanaṁ hika: lavan rabīne śaśamane voṁ menak hika:, hanakiṁ ḍaśi vnaṁṅ aṅali/li\r{i}ana sadr̥/ve\ne lanaṁ mena-[53v1]k·, hanahurana: hutaṁ maniḥ hanakiṁ ḍaśih ika:, maṅkana: ḍarmmane || 0 ||
    .@@M (ma1): -
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁ harabi kahulane, hanak-anaka:hulane, hanak-anakahu- [18v-14]la: hika:, hanake nora milu riṁṅ utaṅe kahula vadon hika, [18v-15]nora milu dr̥veniṁ bapa, yen tan hanak-anak·, voṁṅiṁ kala- [18v-16]van rabine, sasanane voṁ menak· hika, hanakiṁ daśiḥ vnaṁ-vnaṁ [18v-17]haṅlilirana dr̥veniṁ lanaṁ menak·, hanahurana hutaṁ maniḥ, [18v-18]hanakiṁ ḍaśi hika, maṅkaṇa ḍarmmane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ arabi riṅ kavulane, anak-anak kavula ikā, anake nora milu riṅ hutaṅe kavula vadon ikā, nora milu dr̥veniṅ bapa, yen tan anak-anak po voṅ lanaṅ ikā lāvan rabine sasāmane voṅ menak ikā, anakiṅ dāsih vənaṅ aṅalilirana sadr̥veniṅ lanaṅ menak, anahurana hutaṅ manih anakiṅ kavula dasih ikā; maṅkana dharmane.
    3120@@H (edH): riṅ voṅ arabi riṅ kavulane, anak-anak kavula ikā, anake nora milu riṅ hutaṅe kavula vadon ikā, nora milu dr̥veniṅ bapa, yen tan anak-anak po voṅ lanaṅ ikā lāvan rabine sasāmane voṅ menak ikā, anakiṅ dāsih vənaṅ aṅalilirana sadr̥veniṅ lanaṅ menak, anahurana hutaṅ manih anakiṅ dasih kavula ikā, maṅkana dharmane.

    .lanaṅ menak,
    .<app>
    3170 <lem wit="#le2 #lo1 #ja1 #edj #edh">anahurana hutaṅ manih</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#le1" cause="transposition">hanahura <seg type="highlight">maniḥ hutaṅ</seg></rdg>
    .</app>
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le2 #lo1 #ja1 #edj #edh">anakiṅ</lem>
    3175 <rdg wit="#le1">saki</rdg>
    .</app>
    .<app>
    . <lem wit="#le1 #edj">kavula dasih</lem>
    . <rdg wit="#edh">dasih kavula</rdg>
    3180 <rdg wit="#le2 #lo1 #ja1">dasih</rdg>
    .</app>
    .ikā, maṅkana dharmane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="156">
    3185riṅ voṅ anəbus kavulaniṅ akavula, vəruh yen kavulaniṅ voṅ, aṅhiṅ saṅkane anəbus tan pavarah iṅ kaṅ adr̥ve rovaṅ, dene sugih pisis, sakiṅ aklar dene akeh rovaṅe, aṅkara buddhine, saṅkane vāni anəbus kavulaniṅ voṅ, pisis panəbuse ikā, tibā riṅ luvaṅ arane, bilaṅ sinilihmahakən, kavula kaṅ den-təbus alapən deniṅ adr̥ve rovaṅ purvaka.</p>
    .
    .<p n="157">
    .voṅ aṅivat rovaṅ iṅ arovaṅ, katəmu riṅ havan, riṅ paṅaṅson, riṅ tgal, akāraṇa cidra valātkara paṅivate ikā, akāraṇa bañcana, katəmu dene kaṅ adr̥ve voṅ, kaṅ aṅivat ikā patenana yogyane denira saṅ amava bhūmi, maṅkana śāsana sakiṅ śāstra.</p>
    .
    3190<p n="158">
    .riṅ arabi kavulaniṅ voṅ, anak-anak kavula ikā, lavan voṅ sugih, yen voṅ menaka, anake lavan kavulaniṅ voṅ ikā, riṅ dumduman saduman, anak lavan rabi tmən tluṅ duman; maṅkana dharmane; yenora anakiṅ rabi, mati voṅ lanaṅ kaṅ aṅalap kavulaniṅ voṅ ikā, rabine papaḍane kaṅ noranak-anak ikā kari, paḍanən dumduman iṅ balu tan panak ikā, lavan anakiṅ kavulaniṅ voṅ ikā, yen mati balu tan panak ikā, anak kaṅ sakiṅ kavulaniṅ voṅ ikā aṅalap dr̥veniṅ voṅ vadon baluniṅ bapa, nora vənaṅ, yen petən deniṅ kadaṅ vargane balu ikā kaṅ tan panak; maṅkana dharmane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="159">
    .riṅ kavulaniṅ voṅ lanaṅ vadon lagi rare, duruṅ bhiṣa anambut gave den-alap, den-itik-itik iṅ voṅ len harəp huripane rare lanaṅ vadon ikā, yen tan enak aubaya kalavan kaṅ adr̥ve kavula riṅ rare ikā, kaṅ aṅitik-itik, vənaṅ nora vehana təbusan, aveh biluluk iṅ dudu celeṅe arane.</p>
    3195
    .<p n="160">
    .voṅ amalaku pamadal gave, riṅ kavulane lanaṅ vadon, tur kavulane ikā huvus anahur hutaṅ riṅ avake, vus māri dadi kavulane, aṅiṅ dene murkhane saṅkane amalaku pavadal gave, sāhasa amalat, amaleni gave pgat arane, vənaṅ ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="161">
    3200riṅ voṅ akeh sanake paḍa anuṅgoni hutaṅe, voṅ-atuvane lanaṅ vadon paḍa mati, kari paḍa akəmbulan pasusuratan anakiṅ mati, yen anuṅguha karəpe sanake kabeb, dudu hutaṅ sakiṅ voṅ-atuva, paḍa akembulan pavitan hutaṅ-hutaṅan tan sah sakiṅ gustine, anuhu paṅavulane māti salah tuṅgal sanake riṅ panuṅgon, kaṅ mati ikā anuhun hutaṅ arane, aṅloṅana pavitan sadumdumane, yen ta<supplied reason="unknown">n</supplied> mati miṅgat salah tuṅgal mariṅ paradeśa, maləra saguṅiṅ hutaṅe, tan aṅloṅa pavitan, dumən iṅ sanake sakehe kaṅ kari, yen mati riṅ panuṅgon aṅloṅa riṅ rontal pavitan uga hutaṅe sadumduman iṅ māti.</p>
    .
    .<p n="162">
    .riṅ kavula lanaṅ, vadon linəbarakən hutaṅe deniṅ bapa, vəkasan pinet iṅalap deniṅ anak iṅ aṅləbarakən, tan ahiḍəp iṅ varah-varah iṅ bapa, ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, anak iṅ aṅləbarakən kaṅ tan ahiḍəp ujar iṅ voṅ-atuhane ikā.</p>
    .
    3205<p n="163">
    .riṅ kavula miṅgat pisan balaka, katəmu arabi voṅ tan pahutaṅ, manih arabi voṅ menak iṅ parane miṅgat ikana, aomah-omah, katkan sugih, riṅ kavula maṅkana, vənaṅ anəbusa avake lavan anake sapatut iṅ pisis panəbusane riṅ gustine tan evuhana yen sḍəṅ panəbuse avake lavan anake, yen huvus anahur hutaṅ, riṅ kavula, tan kavaśa yen petən manih deniṅ gusti, pati-huripe tan kasiddhi-gaveha, manih tkaniṅ anak putune, buyute; hana ta voṅ amalat anakiṅ kavula huvus anahur hutaṅ, pgat mariṅ kavulane den-viśeṣa, den-iridakna, kaṅ amalat kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, maliṅ kavula arane riṅ voṅ moṅkono.</p>
    .
    .<p n="164">
    .riṅ kavula vadon miṅgat sakiṅ gustine, alaki voṅ tan pahutaṅ, yen alakiya voṅ menak, avake, anake, dr̥vene, vənaṅ-vənaṅe patəlunən deniṅ adum kaṅ roṅ duman den-peta kaṅ aṅalap dāsih ikā, saduman alapən deniṅ gustiniṅ kavula vadon ikā maṅkana anake iku dharmane.</p>
    3210
    .<p n="165">
    .riṅ voṅ amarani kavulane vadon, yen sāhasa den-valat, anaṅis kavulane ikā nora harəp, kəna dene amarani, malayu riṅ rahina, aṅuṅsi kadaṅ-vargane, voṅ-atuhane makādi, hilaṅa butaṅ iṅ kavula vadon ikā, makadoṣane hilaṅa dāsihe, tan kaḍəṇḍaha ikā denira saṅ amava bhūmi. riṅ voṅ amarani kavula dāsih, yen paḍa karəpe lavan gustine, atəmu tan asahura hutaṅ iṅ kavula dāsih maṅkana, pan sahutaṅane dadi tukone, anakiṅ amarani dāsih tan vənaṅ anagiha hutaṅ iṅ kavula ikā; vəkasan kavula kaṅ pinaran ikā luṅhā, alaki riṅ len, dene harəpe anak-anaka, riṅ kavula dāsih maṅkana, anahura hutaṅe anikəl piṅro riṅ gusti kaṅ amarani ikā, tur kaṅ aṅalap kaḍəṇḍaha pataṅ lakṣa dene gustine kavula ikā.</p>
    .
    .<p n="166">
    3215riṅ kavula tavan təbusane, yen harəp asahura voluṅ tali, patuku huripe; maṅkana śāsana riṅ dvāpara tiṅkah iṅ tavan.</p>
    .
    .<p n="167">
    .hutaṅ iṅ kavula ahutaṅ paṅan tan kavaśa nambut gave, sapaha riṅ satahune, iṅhiṅan limaṅ tahun, tan bhiṣa riṅ gave, piṇḍaniṅ hutaṅ riṅ limaṅ tahun, voluṅ tali panahuran iṅ hutaṅ iṅ gusti.</p>
    .
    3220<p n="168">
    .riṅ kavula vadon parəkanira saṅ ləvih, yen pinakarabi deniṅ voṅ jaba tan pamit sakiṅ tambuhe kaṅ aṅalap, rəgane voluṅ ivu, ḍəṇḍane roṅ lakṣa, kaluvaran iṅ doṣane kaṅ aṅalap, yen vəruh adoṣa pati, kaṅ aṅalap; arabi kavulaniṅ ratu, yen tan amit sakiṅ tan vruhe voṅ vadon duruṅ kadaləm, paḍa karəpe kaṅ lanaṅ lan kaṅ vadon saṅkane atəmu, kaṅ aṅalap kaḍəṇḍaha pataṅ lakṣa, rəganiṅ kavulanira roṅ lakṣa, kaluvaran iṅ doṣane aṅalap; voṅ arabi dāsih parəkan iṅ saṅ prabhu, kaṅ huvus mañjiṅ iṅ daləm sakiṅ tan vruhe aṅalap paḍa karəpe lanaṅ lavan vadon, saṅkane atəmu; kaṅ aṅalap ḍəṇḍanən voluṅ lakṣa, rəganiṅ kavula parəkan roṅ lakṣa, yen sakiṅ vəruhe valat doṣa pati de saṅ prabhu, aṅlaṅkahi karaṅ-ulu arane, hana po kavula parəkanira saṅ ləvih, makādi parəkanira saṅ prabhu, huvus katapak denira, aṅhiṅ malər mañjiṅ mətu gavene, kavaśa mariṅ kadaṅ vargane, mariṅ bapa ibune ikā ta yen alapən iṅ voṅ, yen tan vəruha, yen vruha kaṅ aṅalap, doṣa pati uga.</p>
    .
    .<p n="169">
    .mulaniṅ dadi kavula varahakəna maṅke kavula olih iṅ anavan, dvajahr̥ta arane, riṅ kavula duk mətu sakiṅ umahe gustine, gr̥haja arane, aṅavula deniṅ paṅan, bhaktadāsa arane, iku ta kapat śāsanane, maləra riṅ gustine, aṅulahakəna saulah iṅ kavula, anake kabeh ta ulunakəna anak vəsi.</p>
    3225
    .<p n="170">
    .riṅ voṅ amateni voṅ vadon tan padoṣa, hutaṅe mulihanikəl piṅro, tur kaṅ amateni aveha patukuśava pataṅ tali.</p>
    .
    .<p n="171">
    3230riṅ voṅ vadon adol avake, tan den-dol dene <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="71"/>
    . lakine, den-kavulakən dene kaṅ atuku, voṅ atuku iku kaḍəṇḍaha pataṅ lakṣa, voṅ vadon ḍahutən, agave maliṅ strī arane. riṅ voṅ adol rabine, vəkasan pinakarabine voṅ atuku, tan doṣaha kaṅ atuku.</p>
    .
    .<p n="172">
    .riṅ kavula lanaṅ vadon huvus asahur hutaṅ riṅ gusti, den-palakoni vilaṅ gave den-valat dene gustine lavas, kaṅ amalaku vilaṅ gave kaḍəṇḍaha pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur olihe amalaku vilaṅ gave mulihanikəl, maliṅ gave arane voṅ maṅkana.</p>
    3235
    .<p n="173">
    .riṅ voṅ anulisakən aran iṅ voṅ riṅ dodot iṅ voṅ mati, riṅ laruṅane kunəṅ, manih dodot arupa anak-anakan, yen anak-anakan gələpuṅ sa-arane den-tulisakən, den-pəṇḍəm iṅ sma, den-gənahakən riṅ ruhur iṅ kakayon, riṅ ləmah saṅar, riṅ catuspatha, yen hana voṅ maṅkana, agləh anəluh arane, manih riṅ voṅ anulisakən aran iṅ voṅ riṅ baluṅ, riṅ kapāla, den-vor iṅ arəṅ lavan gətih lavan trikaṭuka, den-pəṇḍəm iṅ tuban, riṅ pamaṅgahan, iku agləh anəluh arane, riṅ voṅ, yen aulah moṅkono patenana denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen sacihna sayakti, tkaniṅ anak putune, bapa ibune, sakehe kabeh hayo hana kari riṅ loka, done rahayuhaniṅ bhuvana, kunəṅ sarvadr̥vene alapən denira saṅ amava bhūmi kaṅ hana riṅ gnahe, yen hana riṅ deśa adoh, riṅ deśa len hayo pinet denira, anak putuniṅ anəluh agləh patenana uga de saṅ prabhu apan anut pagavene bapa-ibune, kunəṅ dr̥vene kabeh kaṅ voṅ agləh ikā, kaṅ haneṅ paradeśa, alapən denira saṅ prabhu saṅ viśeṣa riṅ deśa len ikā, saṅgone atitip amtokna saguṅe titipane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="174">
    3240yen hana voṅ aṅulahakən gave, sahosakiṅ tiṅkah iṅ agləh, kasukhahane avake done, saṅkane śatrune māri asəṅit iṅ avake, abalik avəkasan asih, saṅkaniṅ voṅ akeh asih makadi sihaniṅ mitra, mi<pb edRef="#EdJ" n="72"/>
    .trānuraga arane, paran ta ulahe? anulisakən aran iṅ voṅ riṅ tambaga, den-pajokən iṅ kayu, riṅ kabuyutan riṅ saraṅan, anulisakən aran iṅ voṅ iṅ kayu anampəki vijā kuniṅ, yen karuvan riṅ voṅ maṅkana, ḍəṇḍa voluṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="175">
    .voṅ aveh pinaṅan, lavan aveh inum-inuman mati kaṅ den-vehi dene kaṅ den-paṅan, den-inum ikā, kaṅ aveh ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ prabhu; avuru po kaṅ vinehan, māti tibā riṅ api, tibā riṅ bañu, māti deniṅ lalaṇḍəp riṅ ləbuh, riṅ dalan, yan maṅkana tan vicaranən de saṅ amava bhomi.</p>
    3245
    .<p n="176">
    .riṅ voṅ kəḍi, vəkasan arabi paḍa karəpe lavan voṅ vadon alaki-arabi, patenana de saṅ prabhu, prakāśakəna denira.</p>
    .
    .<p n="177">
    3250voṅ kəḍi, riṅ maliṅ, riṅ ātatāyi, yen sacihna sayakti, patenana uga denira saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi, yen hana aṅavara, anuṅkulakən riṅ kaṅ kinon amatenana patihaniṅ kəḍi maliṅ, ātatāyi ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen huvus ḍinəṇḍa kaṅ aṅavara riṅ amateni kəḍi arabi, <unclear>maliṅ</unclear> lavan riṅ ātatāyi, patenana denira.</p>
    .
    .<p n="178">
    .riṅ voṅ andalih anəluh riṅ voṅ tan panəluh, aṅever-everakən iṅ pakehan iṅ voṅ tur tan sacihna sayakti, ḍəṇḍaniṅ avr̥tta tur nora atut amataṅ lakṣa riṅ voṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    3255<p n="179">
    .riṅ voṅ andalih ātatāyi riṅ nora ātatāyi, riṅ voṅ andalih maliṅ riṅ nora maliṅ, liñok pandalihe ḍəṇḍanən roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, anduvilatək arane; riṅ voṅ andalih aṅaloni rabiniṅ voṅ, yen liñok pandalihe, ḍəṇḍa salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi anduvisantən aranya.</p>
    .
    .<p n="180">
    .riṅ voṅ ləvih pinaten deniṅ voṅ dinalih anəluh tur liñok pandalihe, anuli añcorah pasusuratan apan hana <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="73"/>
    3260hutaṅe harəp tan panahurane hutaṅe saṅkane aṅāraṇa andalih anəluh, iku voṅ amati pahutaṅan arane, ḍəṇḍanən voluṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi, tur anahura hutaṅe mulihanikəl, ḍəṇḍane amataṅ lakṣa riṅ voṅ satuṅgal-satuṅgal.</p>
    .
    .<p n="181">
    .riṅ voṅ ātatāyi lavan voṅ abhicāra manih maliṅ, yen paḍa sacihna sayakti patenana denira saṅ amava bhūmi, den-tanpaśeṣa tkaniṅ anak putune prakāśakəna riṅ loka, hayo iṅhurip denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yen malayu luput deniṅ kaṅ kinon amatenana,
    .tan mənəṅa saṅ amava bhūmi, yen aṅuṅsi riṅ deśa paradeśa denira, katəmu patenana uga, buron arane riṅ voṅ maṅkana.</p>
    3265
    .<p n="182">
    .riṅ voṅ avarah riṅ saṅ ləvih yen hana siṅ pelag, yen dr̥ve, vəvənaṅ, yen hana vovohan ratnādi, voṅ vadon ləvih, vəkasan tan təmən, tan karuhan gənahe iku voṅ aveh rāga tan pesi arane, riṅ voṅ maṅkana varah tan tuhu ḍəṇḍa salakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi kahilaṅan iṅ manah muḍhā [H: levih; om.: amava...muḍhā; Add.. 12277 ends here]</p>
    .
    .<!--%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
    3270% BL Add. 12277 ends here, <witEnd target="#lo1 #edh"></witEnd>?
    .% Jonker thought much of what follows, esp. §§ 218–251,
    .% included "several places translated from Manu" ("verschillende uit Manu vertaalde plaatsen," 1885: 6)
    .%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%-->
    .
    3275<p n="183">
    .riṅ voṅ sḍəṅ doṣane, iṅaṅkatakən mariṅ pamaṅgahan, yen ha<supplied reason="unknown">ka</supplied>rəp ahuripa, anəbusa voluṅ tali patuku alas arane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="184">
    .voṅ aṅaku dr̥veniṅ adr̥ve, liñok paṅakune sanes rupane, dr̥veniṅ len ikā lavan dr̥vene, iku <app>
    3280<lem>aṅhoṇo</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">aṅhoko</rdg>
    .</app> dr̥ve arane, ḍəṇḍanə<unclear>n</unclear>
    .<unclear>k</unclear>aṅ aṅaku-aku, samulene dr̥ve den-aku ḍəṇḍahane haji-hajinən rəga de saṅ amava bhūmi aṅalap tur dr̥ve kaṅ den-aku mulihanikəl piṅro.</p>
    .
    3285<p n="185">
    .riṅ camra añokot manuk riṅ kuruṅan anahut ayam iṅ caṅcaṅan, riṅ kuruṅan, tan tinəmbaṅ ikaṅ camra deniṅ adr̥ve, kevala mənəṅ uga, ḍəṇḍanən nəm tali samas kaṅ adr̥ve camra de saṅ amava bhūmi, yen anəmbaṅ riṅ camrane tan patiya ḍəṇḍanən sapaṅrahup iṅ ayam, yen tan <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="74"/>
    . anahut iṅ kuraṅan, iṅ caṅcaṅan patenana uga camrane.</p>
    .
    .<p n="186">
    3290riṅ kbo sapi amaṅan sarva vija<supplied reason="unknown">h</supplied> pari ādine, ikətən ikaṅ kbo sapi deniṅ adr̥ve savah, yen hilaṅ kaṅ kbo sapi, matiha kunəṅ, kaṅ aṅiket aṅəlenana saguṅ-lit iṅ rəganiṅ kbo sapi, yen agəriṅ aveha <app>
    .<lem>vatuku</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">patuku</rdg>
    .</app> tamba, kaṅ adr̥ve kbo sapi aṅə<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">le</unclear>nana saloṅloṅane kaṅ rusak kaṅ p<unclear>in</unclear>aṅan ikā anikəla piṅro, yen tan anəbus tumuli kaṅ adr̥ve kbo sapi, kavṅena, aveha pamilaṅ dina sahiṅane<supplied reason="unknown">,</supplied> tan panəbus, maṅkana śāsananiṅ loka, yen kaṅ adr̥ve kbo sapi aṅalap sakiṅ aspi, tan panəbus iṅ paṅikətan, kaṅ aṅikət nora vəruh, duk den-pet, kaṅ adr̥ve ḍəṇḍanən roṅ tali denira saṅ adr̥ve bhūmi, tur anəbusanikəl piṅro, yen den-coloṅ vəṅi kaṅ iketan kbo sapine riṅ adr̥ve maliṅ arane.</p>
    .
    3295<p n="187">
    .riṅ kbo sapi agalak riṅ pamaṅanane, haneṅ paguyaṅe, riṅ pahubane, yen hana voṅ mari riṅ gənahe kbo sapine, den-siṅhat kaṅ mara ikā, den-gapokunəṅ, dudu aranana aṅamukbo <unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">sa</unclear>pi ikā, tan yogya patenana riṅ kbo sapi agalak, yen pinaran gənahe, yen aṅhel pinagavahakən aniṅhat iṅ amagavehakən, aniṅhat iṅ aṅhon, yen aṅhel sakiṅ <supplied reason="unknown">sakiṅ</supplied> savah, dudu aṅamuk ikā arane, hayo pinaten deniṅ loka.</p>
    .
    .<p n="188">
    .riṅ kbo sapi asiṅhat, atukar iṅ alas, riṅ tgal, riṅ ləmah, nora vəruh <unclear>k</unclear>aṅ aṅhon, yen matiha kaṅ kbo sapi salah viji, yen tikəla kunəṅ, tan təmpahakəna riṅ kaṅ adr̥ve kbo sapi aniṅhat, yen hana kbo sapi iṅhon, asiṅhat paḍa kbo sapi <app>
    3300<lem>aṅhon</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">iṅhon</rdg>
    .</app> nora ginərek deniṅ aṅhon, tan den-sapih, yen mati kasiṅhat, tikəla kunəṅ, petən kaṅ aniṅhat, deniṅ adr̥ve
    .kbo sapi<supplied reason="unknown">,</supplied> mati tikəl kasiṅhat, yen atatu salah tuṅgal, kaṅ adr̥ve<supplied reason="unknown">n</supplied> kbo sapi tan patatu tur aṅlarani aniṅhat
    .aveha patuku tamba riṅ kaṅ <unclear>ka</unclear>siṅhat. <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="75"/>
    3305</p>
    .
    .<p n="189">
    .riṅ kbo sapi agalak asiṅhat iṅ voṅ tan pakāraṇa, aṅamuk ikā arane, yen hana sapi maṅkana, rəbutən tumbakən deniṅ voṅ akeh, alapən dagiṅ<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">e</unclear> kbo sapi ikā, tan vicaranən deniṅ adr̥ve kbo sapi, riṅ sapi sinəṅguh aṅamuk, yen kboha kunəṅ, kaṅ dene səṅguh aṅamuk deniṅ voṅ, tumuli<supplied reason="unknown">ha</supplied> pinaten dinalih aniṅhat; yen liñok ujare kaṅ amateni, apan<supplied reason="unknown">he</supplied> dene karəp iṅ dagiṅ saṅkane amateni, kbo sapi kaṅ den-pateni ikā, mulihanikəl piṇḍo mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve, tur kaḍəṇḍaha roṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    3310<p n="190">
    .riṅ voṅ amaduṅ kayo, aṅrubuhi voṅ, aṅgugutuk olih voṅ, yen upacāra kagutuk, yen tan den-maha, aṅajarakən halahapene kaṅ kagutuk ikā, lavan karubuhan kayu, yen mati kbo sapi salvir iṅ upacāra kaṅ karubuhan kayu, kaṅ kagutuk, aṅlenana samuleniṅ u<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">pa</unclear>cā<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">ra</unclear> kaṅ mati, rəganana sarəgane aṅlekna satṅah mariṅ kaṅ adr̥ve, apan tan den-maha dene aṅrubuhi, dene aṅgutuk ikā, maṅkana śāsananiṅ loka apan iṅ upacāra mūḍha nora vəruh iṅ kagutuk<supplied reason="unknown">a</supplied> yen a<unclear>ṅ</unclear>larani upacāra karubuhan kayu, kagutuk, makādi voṅ, aveha patuku tamba kaṅ aṅrubuhi lavan <app>
    .<lem>kagutuk</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">aṅgutuk</rdg>
    .</app> ikā, ahiṅana savarase, tur kaḍəṇḍaha limaṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi, kaluvarane pagavene <supplied reason="unknown">ra</supplied> taṅane, yen mati voṅ kaṅ karubuhan kayu ikā kaṅ aṅgutuk, kaṅ aṅrubuhi aveha <unclear>pa</unclear>kuramas, lavan patəpuṅ tavar, isuh-isuh mariṅ kadaṅ-varganiṅ mati, yen gustine kunəṅ pakambaligine lavan pakuramas roṅ tali, maṅkana śāsanane, kunəṅ yen tan ahiḍəp liṅ iṅ āgama, kaṅ aṅrubuhi ikā lavan aṅgutuk pāpane paḍa lavan <unclear>ā</unclear>tatāyi riṅ pātaka, yen anaṅtaṅ ababaribinan, kalah dene aucapan, kaṅ mati mulihanikəl piṇḍo, ḍəṇḍa pataṅ lakṣa, paḍakəna lavan amateni akāraṇa kasr̥ṅən, <app>
    3315<lem>amata</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">amaha</rdg>
    .</app> kaliṅane, yen tan <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="76"/>
    . a<supplied reason="unknown">ha</supplied>lara kaṅ karubuhan, lavan kagutuk, tan aveha patuku tamba, tan kaḍəṇḍaha.</p>
    .
    3320<p n="191">
    .riṅ aomah-omah, yen tan aveh <app>
    .<lem>vavacan</lem>
    .<note>Emend upahan?</note>
    .</app>
    3325<app>
    .<lem type="emn">valagara</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">valaga</rdg>
    .</app> riṅ deśa, tan siddha pomah-omahe<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> voṅ alaki-rabi, yen tan asrah
    .<app><lem>papan</lem><note>Emend upahan?</note></app> valagara riṅ deśa manih riṅ sirah, ḍəṇḍa voluṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi, yan riṅ strī uttamā voluṅ tali, yan iṅ stri madhyā pataṅ tali, yan riṅ strī kaniṣṭhā sevu nəm atus, yen tinagih deniṅ deśa tan asrah, maṅkana doṣane.</p>
    3330
    .<p n="192">
    .riṅ rarā huvus vinehan tukon deniṅ jajaka, asaṅketa māsaniṅ dina rabayu patətəmone, duruṅ təka riṅ pasamayaniṅ bapaniṅ rarā, pinuṅpaṅ iṅ jajaka kaṅ sasrah tukon ikā, paḍakəna lan amurugul, āpan tan paṅantekən pasaṅketa maṅkana śāsanane, tukon tan pagave, parahilaṅən, petən deniṅ bapaniṅ rarā, jajaka ikā, ḍəṇḍanən pataṅ lakṣa denira saṅ amava bhūmi,
    .maṅkana pavarah bhagavān bhā<unclear>r</unclear>gava.</p>
    .
    3335<p n="193">
    .riṅ voṅ aomah-omah, alavas atəmu anak-anak <supplied reason="unknown">rarā</supplied>, bapa uga viśeṣa riṅ anake, rarā<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">ma</unclear> vadon nora viśeṣa riṅ anake, yen den-palakekə<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">n</unclear> deniṅ rarāmane vadon rarā ikā, tan pakon iṅ bapa, vənaṅ voṅ atuha lanaṅ amasahakəna palakine rarā ikā, yen dudu karəpe mantu, rarāmane vadon manih rarā ikā, amalekna tukon<supplied reason="unknown">,</supplied> riṅ jajaka tan kinarəpan deniṅ bapaniṅ rara.</p>
    .
    .<p n="194">
    .riṅ voṅ aṅgaməli rarā, anaṅis akrak rarā ginaməlan ikā, akeh vəruh yogya gavenən sākṣi pinakacihnane hana, <app>
    3340<lem>pakənana</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">patenana</rdg>
    .</app> kaṅ aṅgaməli denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>
    .
    .<p n="195">
    3345riṅ voṅ aomah-omah tan panak-anak, mati salah tuṅgal, yen mati vadone <unclear>po</unclear>mah-omahe kabeh ....</p>
    .
    .<p n="196">
    .riṅ voṅ alaki arabi olih amrih-mrih arok <app>
    .<lem>somah-omahe</lem>
    3350<rdg wit="#edj">pomah-omahe</rdg>
    .</app>, gagavane, duk mahu matəmu sovaṅ-sovaṅ,
    .iku nora vənaṅ yen aroka, yen duruṅ gnəp limaṅ <pb edRef="#EdJ" n="77"/>
    . tahun, yen gnəp limaṅ tahun patəmune, arok pomah-omahe,
    .sakalviraniṅ dr̥vene, samaṅkanane <app>
    3355<lem>siddhahavoṅ rika</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">avor ika</rdg>
    .</app>; liṅ saṅ <supplied reason="unknown">pan</supplied> paṇḍita.</p>
    .
    .<p n="197">
    3360riṅ voṅ aomah-omah, arabi saviji, vəkasan akeh <unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">an</unclear>ake, mati rarāmane lanaṅ; anak lanaṅ kaṅ atuha, aṅalapa siṅ dr̥vene ləvih karuhun, uddhāra arane sakiṅ āgama, sasḍəṅe paṅalape, yen aguṅ pomah-omah den-aguṅ paṅalape riṅ paṅaləvih yen alit pomah-omah, den-alit paṅalape <unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">riṅ pa</unclear>ṅaləvih, lvir iṅ uddhāra, satahil, roṅ tahil, pataṅ tahil <supplied reason="unknown">tinuta</supplied> anuta sayogyaniṅ dr̥ve dinum, saṇḍəg iṅ hiṅan, riṅ voṅ <app>
    .<lem>mahomah</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">pomahomah</rdg>
    .</app> paralimanən deniṅ anakaṅ atuha, riṅ mas limaṅ tahil, pinakapaṅaṅgo deniṅ rarāma, paḍa ləvi<unclear reason="eccentric_ductus">h</unclear> rupane, varṇane, kaṅ pataṅ duman alapən iṅ sanak-atuha, kaṅ sa<supplied reason="unknown">dun</supplied>duman dumən papak riṅ sanak anom kabehan, dr̥ve kabeh maṅkana uga, riṅ pañcoddhāra tan yogya hayo aṅalap dr̥ve limaṅ duman, sanakabeh saduman den-kəmbuli, hiṅane alapən pataṅ duman uga, <app>
    .<lem>paṅaləviha</lem>
    3365<rdg wit="#edj">ohe</rdg>
    .</app> sakiṅ sanakabeh iṅaranan caturuddhāra, hayo <app>
    .<lem>pahjeddara</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">pañcoddhāra</rdg>
    .</app> yen sanakatuha aṅaṅgo caturuddhāra anəmu kadərggayu sanaka.</p>
    3370
    .<p n="198">
    .riṅ voṅ <app>
    .<lem>aṅahap</lem>
    .<rdg wit="#edj">aṅalap</rdg>
    3375</app> balubaluniṅ pakaraman balubaluniṅ denbidāra, ḍəṇḍa voluṅ tali denira saṅ amava bhūmi.</p>

    .<!--%%%%%%%%%
    .From here, paraphrasing MDh 8.200–370, acc. to Creese 2009 (??), though there are no mentions of Kuṭāra or Mānava from here on.
    3540%%%%%%%%%

    .<!-- #le1 #le2 #le3 #ja1 #edj -->
    . <!--
    .@@A (le1): riṁ vo haṅasi hutaṁ,, riṁ voṁ hanagiḥ tan patihataṁ, karo ri voṁ [fn: 54][54r1] maṅkana tan vəruḥ hi ḍamma harane,, yen tan hana haR̥p kalaha salaḥ tuṅgal·, konən adevagamaha denira saṅ amava {*} bumi, yen· kna ri deva:gama, konən anahurra hutaṁṅe, mulihanikəl pi\ṇ/do, ri voṁ [54r2] hanagiḥ tan pahutaṁ, mulihanikəl piṁro sapagihe, tur dəṇḍanən ḍenira saṅ amava bhu:mi [SH] saguṁṅ iṁ panagihe mulihanikəl piṁro,, pada huga rehe lavan aṅaṅasi hutaṁ, panikle, dəṇ(danan de)-[54r3]n-pada denira saṁ prabu haṇḍoṣani, riṁ voṁ maṅkana,, 0 ,,
    3545@@B (le2): riṁ voṁṅ aṅasi hutaṁ, riṁ voṁṅ ananagiḥ tan papihutaṁ ka- [40-11]ro riṁ voṁ maṅkana tan və hiṁ ḍḍarma harane, yen tan ha:na haR̥p kala- [40-12]ha salaḥ tuṅgal·, konən adevagamaha denira saṅ <del>ma</del>dr̥- ⌈ [40-13]ve bhūmī, yen· kna riṁ devagama, konən anahura hutaṅe, mu- [40-14]lihanikəl piṁro, riṁṅ anagiḥ tan papihutaṁ, mulihanikəl piṁ- [40-15]ro sapanagihe, tūr dәṇḍanən· denira saṅ amava bhūmī, śa- [40-16]gugiṁ panagihe mulihanikәl piṁro, pada huga rehe lava- [40-17]n aṅaṅasi hutaṁ, panikәle, ḍәṇḍane den-paḍa denira saṁ [40-18]<margin hand="roman">205</margin>prabhū handoṣani riṁ voṁ maṅkaṇa,,
    .@@C (le3): still unidentified
    .@@L (lo1): -
    .@@M (ma1): -
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ voṁṅ aṅasi hutaṁ, riṁ voṁ hanagiḥ tan papiyutaṁ karo hiku [28r-07]riṁ voṁ maṅkaṇa, tan vəruḥ riṁ da:rma harane, yen tan aR̥p kalaha: [28r-08]salaḥ taṅgal·, konən adevagama:ha, denira saṅ a:mava bu- [28r-09]mi, yen kәna hadeva:gama:, konən ana:hurra hutaṅe, hanikə- [28r-10]l piṁ ro, riṁ hanagiḥ tan papiyutaṁ, muliḥ hanikəl piṁ ro sa- [28r-11]panagihe, tur ḍanən denira saṅ amava bami, saguṁ panagihe tikə- [28r-12]lakna piṁ ro, paḍa huga rehe, lavan aṅaṅasi hutaṁ, panikә- [28r-13]le makaḍaṇḍane, ḍen-paḍan-paḍakna denira saṁ prabhu [28r-14], hanḍosani maṅkaṇa ,, 0 ,,
    3550@@J (edJ): riṅ voṅ aṅaṅasi hutaṅ, riṅ voṅ anagih tan papihutaṅ karo riṅ voṅ maṅkana tan vəruh iṅ dharma arane, yen tan (hana) harəp kalaha salah tuṅgal, konən adevāgamaha denira saṅ amava bhumi, yen kəna riṅ devāgama konən anahura hutaṅe, mulihanikəl piṇḍo, riṅ voṅ anagih tan papihutaṅ mulihanikəl piṅro sapanagihe, tur ḍəṇḍanən denira saṅ amava bhumi saguṅiṅ panagihe mulihanikəl piṅro, paḍa uga rehe lāvan aṅaṅasi hutaṅ panikəle, ḍəṇḍanən den-paḍa denira saṅ prabhu andoṣani riṅ voṅ maṅkana.
    .@@H (edH): -
    . -->

    .@@A (le1): riṅ dr̥vya binu\k/ti deniṁṅ len·, rariṁ saṇdi§[SH]ṅ iṁkaṁṅ adr̥ve, tur mnə tumon iṁ dr̥vene bhinukti riṁ voṁ len·, yen akara daśa tahuṇ{*}· {ui voṁ latala ⌈} [54r4] {denira saṅ amava bumi,, riṁ ri lavaśe dr̥ve den-bukti riṁ voṁ len·, hilaṁ-hilaṁ hikaṁ dr̥ve yan maṅkana, prasidḍa dr̥veniṁ sari-sari sari mambukti, Amalaku haji sapisis·, pisan kevala, kaṅ adr̥ve mu[54v1]la, tan yogya vehana, kadaśavarṣa harane,,
    .@@B (le2): riṁ dr̥vya bhūnukti deniṁ len·, [40-19]riṁ saṇḍiṅiṁ kaṅ adr̥ve, tūr mnəṁ tumon iṁ ḍr̥vene, bhūnukti riṁ voṁ, [40-20]yen akaranaha dasa tavun lavase dr̥vene den-bhukti riṁ voṅ len·, [40-21]hilaṅ iṁ dr̥vene yan maṅkana, prasida: dr̥veniṁ sa:ri-sari mambhukti, A- [40-22]malakuha haji sapisis·, pisan kevala, kaṅ adr̥ve mūla, tan yo- [40-23]<margin hand="roman">206</margin>gya vehana, kadasava:rṣa harane ,, 0 ,,
    3660@@C (le3): riṁ dr̥ve binūkti deniṅ len· [67-07]ri sandiṅiṁ kaṅ adr̥ve, mnəṁ tumon iṁ bhūktine ḍr̥vene binukti riṁ [67-08]voṁ, yen akaraṇa sadaśa tahun lavase dr̥vene den-bukti [67-09]deniṁ voṁ len·, hilaṁ dr̥ve yan maṅkana:, prasidda dr̥veniṁ [67-10]śariṁ-śariṁ mambukti, hamalakuha hajiṁ sapisis· pisan balaka dr̥- [67-11]ve mule, tan yogya vehana:, kadaśavarśan harane ,, 0 [67-12]<margin hand="roman">76</margin> ,,
    .@@L (lo1): -
    .@@M (ma1): -
    .@@X (ja1): riṁ dr̥ve binukti deniṁ len·, riṁ sinandiṅi dr̥ve, tur mnəṁ tu- ⌈ [28r-16]mon iṁ ḍr̥vene, binukti riṁ voṁ len·, yen dakara, saḍa- [28r-17]sa tahun lavase binukti riṁ voṁ len·, hilaṁ hikaṁ dr̥ve ya- [28r-18]n maṅkaṇa, prasidḍa dr̥ve sinari-sari hambukti, hamalaku haji sa- [28r-19]pisis·, pisan kevala:, kaṅ a:dr̥ve mulat mәnәṁ, tan ogya [28r-20]veḥhana, kaḍasa:varṣa harane ,, 0 ,,
    .@@J (edJ): riṅ dr̥vya bhinukti deniṅ len riṅ saṇḍiṅiṅ kaṅ adr̥ve tur mənəṅ tumon iṅ dr̥vene bhinukti riṅ voṅ len, yen akara daśa tahun riṅ lavase dr̥ve den-bhukti riṅ voṅ len, hilaṅ ikaṅ dr̥ve yan maṅkana prasiddha dr̥veniṅ sarisari ambhukti, amalaku haji sapisis pisan kevala kaṅ adr̥ve mula, tan yogya vehana, kadaśavarṣa arane.
